Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • flagflat - Flag WFPC flat field pixels which are abnormally high or low
  • mka2d - Create or modify an A-to-D correction reference file for WFPC.
  • mkphottb - Create a synthetic photometry lookup table for WFPC.
  • normclip - Normalize WFPC flat fields among chips.
  • psfextr - Extract a subsection of an image to be put in the PSF library.
  • streakflat - Generate WFPC flat field from streak exposures of the Earth.

  • (Type "help w_calib option=sysdoc" for detailed information about the `w_calib'
  • package).
